description: Explore the transformative impact of smart contracts on digital transactions and blockchain technology, covering their history, functionality, benefits, and applications across various industries. Understand the challenges and future prospects of this innovative technology.
keywords: smart contracts, blockchain technology, digital transactions, Ethereum, finance, banking, supply chain, real estate, healthcare, intellectual property, transparency, security, scalability, AI, IoT
title: Transforming Transactions: The Rise and Impact of Smart Contracts on Blockchain Technology
